title: Particle diagram of KCl - solution in vessel 2

content.prompt: Equal volumes of solutions in two different vessels are represented above. If the solution represented in vessel 1 is KCl(aq), then the solution represented in vessel 2 could be an aqueous solution of

choices.label: KCl with the same molarity as the solution in vessel 1
KCl with twice the molarity of the solution in vessel 1
CaCl2 with the same molarity as the solution in vessel 1
CaCl2 with twice the molarity of the solution in vessel 1

skill.text: 3.C: Represent visually the relationship between the structures and interactions across multiple levels or scales (e.g., particulate to macroscopic).
